dialogue.dialogueText: I'm looking for a Sheriff Briggs. Heard of him?
I am parched, but I'm dead broke ma'am. Used my last dollar getting here. Any work in this town for someone who knows their way around a pistol?
Alright I'll go up and take a look.
Beth Anne at the Rose said you were having some trouble with a gang.
Don't worry Martha I dont take too kindly to bullies throwing their weight around
A hot supper will be plenty, this farm reminds me a little of where I grew up
Fine by me, just say when.
